metadata.title: CVE-2021-44717 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Go before 1.16.12 and 1.17.x before 1.17.5 on UNIX allows write operationsto an unintended file or unintended network connection as a consequence oferroneous closing of file descriptor 0 after file-descriptor exhaustion.

criterions.comment: golang-1.17 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
